bug.short_desc: libsemanage: FTBFS - fatal error: Python.h: No such file or directory
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Package libsemanage fails to build from source in Fedora rawhide and Fedora 26 with following error:
semanageswig_wrap.c:149:11: fatal error: Python.h: No such file or directory # include <Python.h> ^~~~~~~~~~ compilation terminated.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 2.6-1.1.fc26
Steps to Reproduce: koji build --scratch f27 libsemanage-2.6-1.1.fc26.src.rpm
Additional info: This package is tracked by Koschei. See: http://apps.fedoraproject.org/koschei/package/libsemanage
Dependency changes since last successful build: python2-devel 2.7.13-4.fc26 > 2.7.13-5.fc26 python3 3.6.0-12.fc26 > 3.6.0-18.fc26 python3-devel 3.6.0-12.fc26 > 3.6.0-18.fc26 python2 2.7.13-4.fc26 > 2.7.13-5.fc26 python2-rpm-macros 3-18.fc26 > 3-19.fc26 pcre 8.40-2.fc26 > 8.40-3.fc26 pcre-devel 8.40-2.fc26 > 8.40-3.fc26 python-rpm-macros 3-18.fc26 > 3-19.fc26 libstdc++ 7.0.1-0.8.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 libgcc 7.0.1-0.8.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 system-python 3.6.0-12.fc26 > 3.6.0-18.fc26 python2-libs 2.7.13-4.fc26 > 2.7.13-5.fc26 python3-libs 3.6.0-12.fc26 > 3.6.0-18.fc26 kernel-headers 4.10.0-0.rc8.git2.1.... > 4.10.0-1.fc26 python3-rpm-macros 3-18.fc26 > 3-19.fc26 system-python-libs 3.6.0-12.fc26 > 3.6.0-18.fc26 pcre-cpp 8.40-2.fc26 > 8.40-3.fc26 sqlite-libs 3.16.2-3.fc26 > 3.17.0-1.fc26 pcre-utf32 8.40-2.fc26 > 8.40-3.fc26 pcre-utf16 8.40-2.fc26 > 8.40-3.fc26 python-srpm-macros 3-18.fc26 > 3-19.fc26 gcc 7.0.1-0.8.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 gcc-c++ 7.0.1-0.8.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 cpp 7.0.1-0.8.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 libgomp 7.0.1-0.8.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 libsemanage 2.5-10.fc26 > 2.6-1.1.fc26 diffutils 3.5-1.fc26 > 3.5-3.fc26 libstdc++-devel 7.0.1-0.8.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 libarchive 3.2.2-2.fc26 > 3.2.2-3.fc26
